Instruction: In a large bowl, combine cubed watermelon, diced cucumber, thinly sliced red onion, crumbled feta cheese, and chopped fresh parsley.
In a small bowl, whisk together lime juice and honey.
Drizzle the lime-honey dressing over the salad and toss gently to coat.
Chill the watermelon cucumber salad in the refrigerator for at least 15 minutes before serving.
Serve cold as a refreshing summer side dish.
